name: Ritika Saini

full_output.summary: Highly motivated and diligent B.Tech student specializing in Computer Science and Engineering with a focus on Data Science. Adept at leveraging strong analytical and programming skills to solve complex problems and deliver innovative solutions. Passionate about continuous learning and professional development, seeking opportunities to contribute to dynamic projects and collaborate with diverse teams. Strong foundation in data analytics, software development, and algorithm design, complemented by hands-on experience in various technical projects and internships.

projects.description: Implemented a house price prediction model using Python, leveraging scikit-learn for data preprocessing, feature engineering, and machine learning algorithms, resulting in accurate price predictions and valuable market insights.

projects.description: Created a fully functional e-commerce web application inspired by Myntra, featuring product listings, user authentication, shopping cart, and payment integration. Enhanced user experience with responsive design and efficient search capabilities.

experiences.description: Currently interning in the Banking and Financial Services (BFS) domain at LTIMindtree. In the early stages of the internship, focusing on onboarding, understanding key processes, and familiarizing with industry-specific tools and methodologies.

During my internship, I developed and maintained WordPress websites, utilizing custom themes and plugins to enhance functionality and user experience. I collaborated with designers and content creators to implement responsive and visually appealing web designs. I optimized websites for performance and SEO, resolved technical issues, and contributed to the overall improvement of website quality.

During my internship, I developed and maintained web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, collaborating with designers and backend developers to create responsive and visually appealing web pages. I actively participated in code reviews to enhance application quality and debugged frontend issues to ensure a seamless user experience.
